Name: First Justice
Effect: Possess target item that costs 3 or less.

Name: Just Don't Be Poor
Effect: Target player loots X

Name: Fair Trade
Effect: Additional Cost - Sacrifice an item. Draw 2 cards.
Flavor: Give one, take two. Clearly fair!

Name: Mandatory Donation
Effect: Opponent chooses an item he controls, posses that item.
Flavor: I'll be nice. You pick what you want to give me.

Name: BA05
Effect: Opponent discards an Spell.

Name: Gentelmen's Club ID
Effect: Activate:   Loot 1

Name: False Accusations
Effect: Sacrifice an item, Activate:    Opponent purges 5.    If sacrificed item belongs to him, he purges 10 instead.

Name: Investment Banking Contract
Effect: Sacrifice an Item:    Gain 1 Energy.    If that item is owned by the opponent gain 1 additional energy.
Flavor: You should invest in my company.

Name: Ex's Number
Effect: Activate, Sacrifice ~:    Draw a card from your void then    purge a card from your hand

Name: Blackmail Note
Effect: Condition - Control a card you don't own.    Activate:      Opponent purges 3.

Name: Righteous Repossession
Effect: 3, Activate:    Draw top item of opponent's deck.

Name: Forged Receipt
Effect: 3, Sacrifice ~, Activate:    Possess target item.
Flavor: I own this. I paid for it.

Name: BI08
Effect: 1, Activate, Sacrifice ~:    Look at opponent's hand and choose an Spell from it.    They discard it.

Name: UA01
Effect: Purge all copies of a target card from your scrapyard.  Opponent Purge as many cards.

Name: UA02
Effect: Transmute target item into Junk

Name: UA03
Effect: Search top 4 cards of your deck for a kit card and put into play.  Put rest to the bottom of your library.

Name: UA04
Effect: Choose an item from opponent's hand and transform it into Junk

Name: UA05
Effect: Additional Cost - Purge 5 items from your scrapyard.  Transmute target item you control into a copy of target item in your void.

Name: UI01
Effect: Discard 2:    Transform ~ into AI01.

Name: UI02
Effect: Shuffle 3 Junk into your deck, Activate:    Opponent purges 3.

Name: UI03
Effect: 1, Activate:    Look at the top 2 cards of your library.    You may discard any number of them.    Put the rest in the same order.

Name: UI04
Effect: 1, Discard 1:    Transform ~ into AI02.

Name: UI05
Effect: 1, Activate:    Look at the top 2 cards of your deck.    Draw one.    Transform other into junk and shuffle into the deck.

Name: UI06
Effect: Discard 1, Purge 1:    Gain 1 Energy

Name: UI07
Effect: X, Sacrifice ~:    Look at opponent's deck.    Choose a card that costs X or less from it.    Transform chosen card into junk.

Name: UI08
Effect: Discard a Junk: Charge 1. Sacrifice an Item: Charge 1.  If it has 3 charges, transform ~ into AI03

Name: YA01
Effect: Gain reflect 2. Shuffle ~ back into your deck.

Name: YA02
Effect: Cancel target Spell.

Name: YA03
Effect: Cancel target card.

Name: YA04
Effect: Recover X.  Purge ~

Name: YA05
Effect: Return target Spell from scrapyard to your hand. Purge ~

Name: YA06
Effect: Each player draws 3 cards

Name: YI01
Effect: Charge 4.  3, Sacrifice ~:    Gain shield X.   X = # of charge counters

Name: YI02
Effect: Charge 2.  3, Sacrifice ~:    Gain reflect X   X = # of charge counters

Name: YI03
Effect: 2, Activate:    Create and draw a YI01 or YI02.

Name: YI04
Effect: 2X, Activate:    Target item Charge X.

Name: YI05
Effect: 2, Activate:   Gain reflect 2.

Name: YI06
Effect: Sacrifice an item, Activate:   Opponent purges X,    where X is # of charge counter on sacrificed item.

Name: Hot Potato
Effect: Return target item to controller's hand.  Opponent purges 2

Name: Groundhog Day
Effect: Put target item on top of controller's deck

Name: Charge Hard
Effect: Opponent purges 2.  Shuffle ~ to your deck.

Name: Buy More Time
Effect: Additional Cost    Shuffle a card from your hand to your deck.  Draw two cards.

Name: Makeshift Bomb
Effect: Additional Cost    Return an item you control to your hand.  Opponent purges 4.

Name: Nope!
Effect: Return target Spell to its controller's hand.

Name: Laser Axe Launcher
Effect: 1, Activate:    Opponent purges 2.

Name: Axarang
Effect: Activate:    Return ~ and target item to controller's hand.

Name: Disposable Chainsaw
Effect: Charge 3.   Discharge 1, Activate:    Opponent purges 3
Flavor: There enough fuel for only three uses.

Name: Log Launcher
Effect: Charge X.  Dischage 1, Activate:   Opponent purges 3.

Name: Piggybank
Effect: Discard a card:    Charge 1.   Discharge 1, Activate:    Opponent purges 4

Name: Goat Launcher
Effect: Sacrifice an Item, Activate:    Opponent purges X.    X = cost of sacrificed item.

Name: Babe The Baby Blue Ox
Effect: X, Purge X, Activate:    Opponent purge X
Flavor: Their copy was old and discolored.

Name: NT01
Effect: Study:   Gain BU

Name: NT02
Effect: Study:   Gain BR

Name: NT03
Effect: Study:   Gain UR

Name: NT04
Effect: Study:   Gain BB

Name: NT05
Effect: Study:   Gain UU

Name: NT06
Effect: Study:   Gain RR

Name: AI01
Effect: Destroy:    Target player Purge 6.

Name: AI02
Effect: Purge a Junk from your hand, Activate:    Target opponent Purges 5

Name: AI03
Effect: Discharge 1:    Opponent purges 4.    If ~ has no counters on it, transform ~ to UI08
